title: Crpto Tracker
description: This is a project made to learn the latest web technologies by building a cryptocurrency tracker app for real-time price and market monitoring

title: Amazon clone
description: Built to learn modern web technologies by building an Amazon clone app with features like product listings, a shopping cart, and user authentication.

title: Weather App
description: Built to explore web technologies through a weather app and fetches real-time weather data using an API displays it for user-specified locations.
